case.title: Renaissance Man - 21 (NYC)
case.text:
Have you ever met someone before and the conversation was so good that it left you in "Awe" but you are still searching?
I am the type of woman you would like to be around. I carry myself very well in any type of situation. I can go from blue jeans and a nice shirt to a little black dress and heels. Its time for new experiences and adventures. If you think we would be suited or are looking for regular but discreet fun on a SB/SD basis then I could be just what you are looking for. I'm looking to find someone older, intelligent, driven, successful, that I can have fun with! I would love to be spoiled and pampered. Spoil me. Adore Me. Want Me. I want to be your exotic surprise. please send a pic and a response detailing what your idea of a perfect sb/sd relationship is for you.
P.s Don't waste your and my time If your going to send a one liner or a picture of your friend downstairs.I don't send face pictures to people I Have never met.
